name: BASIL SKARIA
tagline: Career Consultant | Specialist Programer @Infosys | ADF | PySpark | ECommerce Applications | Application Performance Management | Azure | Dotnet
summary: I am an inquisitive and people-oriented engineer with a passion for managing and solving complex projects. With a strong analytical skillset and a focus on human-centric solutions, I specialize in leveraging cutting-edge technologies to optimize and build solutions that make a difference. As a Developer Lead for a performance improvement team, I swiftly collaborated and communicated insights to diverse teams, achieving this role within just 8 months. With a track record of success in managing and delivering high-quality projects, I am committed to driving innovation and making a positive impact. Let's connect and explore how we can work together to create impactful solutions.
